STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe secret API key for server-side operations
setupSteps: Go to Stripe Dashboard > Developers > API keys
Copy your Secret key (test or live mode)

STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Webhook signing secret for verifying webhook events
setupSteps: Go to Stripe Dashboard > Developers > Webhooks
Add an endpoint and copy the signing secret

CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY.description: Clerk publishable key for client-side authentication
setupSteps: Go to Clerk Dashboard > API Keys
Copy your Publishable key

CLERK_SECRET_KEY.description: Clerk secret key for server-side operations
setupSteps: Go to Clerk Dashboard > API Keys
Copy your Secret key

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for accessing GPT models and embeddings
setupSteps: Go to OpenAI Platform > API keys
Create a new secret key and copy it

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Anthropic API key for accessing Claude models
setupSteps: Go to Anthropic Console > API Keys
Create a new API key and copy it
Go to Supabase Dashboard > Project Settings > API
Copy the Project URL

SUPABASE_KEY.description: Supabase anon/public key for client-side access
setupSteps: Go to Supabase Dashboard > Project Settings > API
Copy the anon/public key

RESEND_API_KEY.description: Resend API key for sending transactional emails
setupSteps: Go to Resend Dashboard > API Keys
Create a new API key and copy it

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: SendGrid API key for sending emails
setupSteps: Go to SendGrid Dashboard > Settings > API Keys
Create a new API key with Mail Send permissions

SENDGRID_FROM.description: Verified sender email address for SendGrid
setupSteps: Go to SendGrid Dashboard > Settings > Sender Authentication
Verify your sender email or domain
Go to MongoDB Atlas > Database > Connect
Choose Connect your application
Copy the connection string and replace <password> with your password
Get your Redis connection URL from your Redis provider
Include authentication credentials if required

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: GitHub personal access token for API access
setupSteps: Go to GitHub Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens
Generate a new token with appropriate scopes

VERCEL_TOKEN.description: Vercel API token for deployments and API access
setupSteps: Go to Vercel Dashboard > Settings > Tokens
Create a new token and copy it

HF_API_KEY.description: HuggingFace API key for inference endpoints
setupSteps: Go to HuggingFace Settings > Access Tokens
Create a new token with appropriate permissions

REPLICATE_API_TOKEN.description: Replicate API token for running ML models
setupSteps: Go to Replicate Account Settings
Copy your API token

PINECONE_API_KEY.description: Pinecone API key for vector database operations
setupSteps: Go to Pinecone Console > API Keys
Copy your API key
Create an index in the Pinecone Console
Use the index name here

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key ID for S3 operations
setupSteps: Go to AWS IAM Console > Users > Your User > Security credentials
Create an access key and copy the Access key ID

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key for S3 operations
setupSteps: This is shown only once when creating the access key
Store it securely as you cannot retrieve it later
Identify the region where your S3 bucket is located
Create a bucket in S3 Console or use existing one
Use the bucket name here

R2_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Cloudflare account ID for R2 storage
setupSteps: Go to Cloudflare Dashboard
Copy your Account ID from the sidebar
Go to R2 > Manage R2 API Tokens
Create a token and copy the Access Key ID
This is shown only once when creating the API token
Store it securely
Create a bucket in R2 or use existing one
Go to UploadThing Dashboard > API Keys
Copy your Secret key
Go to UploadThing Dashboard
Copy your App ID

LIVEBLOCKS_SECRET_KEY.description: Liveblocks secret key for real-time collaboration
setupSteps: Go to Liveblocks Dashboard > Project > API keys
Copy your Secret key

ABLY_API_KEY.description: Ably API key for real-time messaging
setupSteps: Go to Ably Dashboard > Your App > API Keys
Copy your API key

LEMONSQUEEZY_API_KEY.description: Lemon Squeezy API key for payments
setupSteps: Go to Lemon Squeezy Settings > API
Create an API key
Go to Lemon Squeezy Settings > Stores
Copy your Store ID
Go to PlanetScale Dashboard > Your Database > Connect
Select your language and copy the connection string
Generate a secure random string
Share with the webhook provider
